name: Buttcoinng
body:
###ButtcoinNG
ButtcoinNG protects your data and privacy through unlinkable transactions with ring signatures

* CryptoNote protocol & CryptoNight algorithm 
* Unique cryptography 
* Full data & privacy protection 
* Fast miner 
* ASIC-resistance & only CPU mining
* Secure transactions 

###ButtcoinNG is the future
Buttcoin NG conducts unlinkable transactions by creating
multiple unique one-time addresses for each of the payments
which are created from a single public key. Even though the
payment is sent to a public address, in the block chain it appears
as if sent to a one-time address. 

Itâ€™s designed to be egalitarian, being suitable for ordinary PC
CPUs, but not for special purpose devices for mining. 

###Download wallet and mining software
**Will be released soon**
